caption.p: (A) Effect of compound 12c on the cell cycle and apoptosis in MCF-7 cells. Cells were treated with either vehicle [0.1% ethanol (v/v)], CA-4 (50 nM), 12c (50 nM and 250 nM) for 24 h, 48 h and 72 h. Cells were then fixed, stained with PI, and analysed by flow cytometry. Cell cycle analysis was performed on histograms of gated counts per DNA area (FL2-A). The number of cells with (B) 4 N (G 2/M), (C) 2 N(G 0G 1), and (D) <2 N (sub-G 1) DNA content was determined with CellQuest software. Values represent the mean ± SEM for three independent experiments. Statistical analysis was performed using two-way ANOVA (* p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001).
